FuncDef: Display the scheduler stats per SAP.

ParaDef.Info: The port number and encapsulation value used to identify the SAP. Values-The following values apply to the 7750 SR and 7950 XRS:.
The name of an existing scheduler policy.
Display only the policy displayed on the ingress SAP.
Display only the policy displayed on the egress SAP.
Specifies the name of the encap-group and can be up to 32 ASCIIcharacters.
Specifies the value of the single encap-id. Values-1 to 16777215.
